title: Aneeth Arora throws 'Pajama Party' on Day 4 of Amazon India Fashion Week SS'16
text: Aneeth Arora throws 'Pajama Party' on Day 4 of Amazon India Fashion Week SS'16 Sunday, 11 October 2015 (11 minutes ago) Fashion designer Aneeth Arora threw a pajama party on the ramp of Amazon India Fashion Week Spring Summer 2016. Shivan- Narresh gives twist to `bikinis` at Amazon India Fashion Week SSâ€™16 01:19 New Delhi, Oct 8 (ANI): The duo famous for reimagining the bikinis, Shivan- Narresh showcased their latest swimwear collection on Day 1 of 2016 Amazon India Fashion Week in the national capital. The collection was displayed with the models sashaying up and down the runway in sexy yet classy bikinis,... Recent related news Day three of the ongoing Amazon India Fashion Week Spring/Summer 2016 at NSIC Grounds, Okhla opened up a dialogue on reinventing oneself through design. MailOnline India 14 hours ago - India New Delhi, Oct 10 : Fashion designer Payal Jain stunned the audience with her 'La Playa Blanca' collection which absolutely changed the perception of beach wear... newKerala.com 1 day ago - India Day Two of the Amazon India Fashion Week saw some awe-inspiring creations. DNA 3 days ago - Front Page Current fashion darling Sanjay Garg opened AIFW in Delhi with a stellar collection, an a cappella band and mogra flowers.
